General.Name: Wi2Wi Corporation
General.Description: Wi2Wi Corporation manufactures and sells wireless connectivity solutions, precision timing devices, frequency control products, and microwave filters in the United States and internationally. It offers wireless connectivity solutions, such as multi-protocol, Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth/BLE modules; location and navigation products, including GNSS and GPS modules; and timing and frequency control products comprising clock oscillators, crystals, crystal filters, and RF and microwave filters. The company also provides rubber duck antennas, PCB antennas, and antenna connector cables. Its products are primarily used in Internet of Things (IoT), industrial IoT, avionics, space, military, and industrial applications. Wi2Wi Corporation is headquartered in San Jose, California.
General.Address: 1879 Lundy Avenue, San Jose, CA, United States, 95131
